<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://home24.de/data/common/exceptiontypes/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://home24.de/data/common/exceptiontypes/v1" xmlns:oms="http://home24.de/data/custom/ordertransaction/v1"> <xsd:element name="exception" type="ExceptionType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ExceptionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="context" type="FaultContextType"/> <xsd:element name="severity" type="MessageLevelEnum" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="category" type="FaultCategoryEnum"/> <xsd:element name="faultInfo" type="FaultInfoType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FaultContextType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="sourceSystemName" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the source system where the error occurred</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="environment" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the environment where the error occurred</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="transactionId" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifier of the business transaction where the error occurred</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="flowId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Flow Identifier (Oracle)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ecid" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Execution Context Identifier (Oracle)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="activityId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ID of the activity where the error occurred</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="compositeInstanceId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ID of the composite instance where the error occurred</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="processLibraryId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ID of the current business process where the error occurred</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="payload" type="xsd:anyType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the payload where the error occurred</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="additionalInfo" type="KeyValueCollectionType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Additional information as a key value list</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FaultInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="faultCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="faultMessage" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="faultDetails" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="faultTimestamp" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="faultUserArea" type="xsd:anyType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="KeyValueCollectionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="keyValuePair" type="KeyValueType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="KeyValueType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="key" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="FaultCategoryEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="TechnicalFault"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DataFault"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BusinessFault"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LoggingFault"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ErrorListenerFault"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DeadLetterFault"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TriggerFault"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MessageLevelEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="FATAL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ERROR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="WARNING"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INFO"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://home24.de/data/common/serviceinformationtypes/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://home24.de/data/common/serviceinformationtypes/v1"> <xsd:complexType name="ServiceInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Version" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ExecutionEnvironment" type="tns:ExecutionEnvironmentType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ExecutionEnvironmentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Environment" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ServerName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://home24.de/data/common/messageheadertypes/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://home24.de/data/common/messageheadertypes/v1"> <xsd:complexType name="MessageHeaderType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="MessageInformationType"/> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MessageInformationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Message" type="MessageType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Caller" type="CallerType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Operation" type="OperationType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="CorrelationID" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ActivityID" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="KeyValueList" type="KeyValueListType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MessageType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CreationDate" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Type" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ID" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Version" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ReferenceID" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CallerType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="SourceSystemName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Environment" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="User" type="UserType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OperationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="OperationName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Batch" type="BatchFieldsType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="UserType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="UserID" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="UserPassword" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="UserLocation" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BatchFieldsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="BatchNr" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="JobNr" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="KeyValueListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="KeyValuePair" type="KeyValueType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="KeyValueType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Key" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Value" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="MessageHeader" type="MessageHeaderType"/> </xsd:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="NO_NAMESPACE" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:nn="NO_NAMESPACE" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="update" type="nn:UpdateType"/> <xs:element name="updateWrapper" type="nn:UpdateWrapperType"/> <xs:element name="updateAcknowledgement" type="nn:UpdateAcknowledgementType"/> <xs:element name="updateAcknowledgementFromShop" type="nn:UpdateAcknowledgementFromShopType"/> <xs:element name="updateCommitment" type="nn:UpdateCommitmentType"/> <xs:complexType name="UpdateWrapperType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="nn:update"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="UpdateAcknowledgementType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="acknowledgement" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="UpdateAcknowledgementFromShopType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="queueId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="error" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="UpdateCommitmentType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="queueId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="orderNumber" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="status" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="resultDetails" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="UpdateType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="base_data" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="order" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="order_items" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="order_item"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="item_id" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="reference-id" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="order_number" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="reference-id" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="transaction_data" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="message" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Created" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="25"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Structure_Version" type="xs:decimal" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="type" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="actions" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="action"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="data" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element type="xs:dateTime" name="date" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element type="xs:string" name="in_time" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element type="xs:long" name="tracking_number" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element type="xs:string" name="carrier" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element type="xs:string" name="reference_number" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element type="xs:byte" name="dunning_level" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="comment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="image_folder_link" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="140"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="reclamation_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="reclamation_reason" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="100"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="capture" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element type="xs:string" name="amount"/> <xs:element type="xs:string" name="currency"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="attachments" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="attachment" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="type"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="link"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="130"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element type="xs:string" name="content"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="sparepart" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="for" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
